sen.j: 木津屋橋通（きづやばしどおり）は、京都市内の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Kizuyabashi-doori street is one of the streets running from east to west in Kyoto City.
Kizuyabashi-doori street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
Kizuyabashi-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東は東洞院通から西は御前通まで。
sen.e: Kizuyabashi-doori street runs from a point on Higashi-no-doin-doori street at its east end to a point on Gozen-doori street at its west end.
Kizuyabashi-doori street runs from a point on Higashi-no-doin-doori street at its east end to a point on Gozen-doori street at its west end.
Kizuyabashi-dori Street runs from a point on Higashinotoin-dori Street at its east end to a point on Onmae-dori Street at its west end.
sen.cmt: Kizuyabashi-dori Street に修正、「東洞院通」「御前通」の読みの誤りを訂正し、それぞれ"Higashinotoin-dori Street,""Onmae-dori Street"としました。

sen.j: 七条通と塩小路通の間。
sen.e: Kizuyabashi-doori street connects between Shichijo-doori street and Shiokoji-doori street.
Kizuyabashi-doori street connects Shichijo-doori street with Shiokoji-doori street.
Kizuyabashi-dori Street connects Shichijo-dori Street with Shiokoji-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Kizuyabashi-dori Street, Shichijo-dori Street, Shiokoji-dori Street.に修正

sen.j: 途中梅小路公園と新千本通の間で中断する。
sen.e: Kizuyabashi-doori street vanishes in the middle of itself between Umekoji Park and Shinsenbon-doori street.
Kizuyabashi-doori street vanishes in the middle between Umekoji Park and Shinsenbon-doori street.
Kizuyabashi-dori Street vanishes in the middle between Umekoji Park and Shinsenbon-dori Street.

sen.j: 京都タワーと近鉄百貨店の間の通り。
sen.e: Kizuyabashi-doori street is a street connecting between Kyoto Tower and Kintetsu Department Store.
Kizuyabashi-doori street is a street connecting Kyoto Tower with Kintetsu Department Store.
Kizuyabashi-dori Street is a street connecting Kyoto Tower with Kintetsu Department Store.

sen.j: 堀川通から西は小規模な手工業者の混在した住宅街。
sen.e: The section in the west of a point on Horikawa-doori street passes through a residential area where factories of small-scale handicraft manufacturers operate being mixed up with the residences.
The section west of Horikawa-doori street passes through a residential area where small scale handicraft manufacturer factories operate amidst residences.
The section west of Horikawa-dori Street passes through a residential area where small scale handicraft manufacturer factories operate amidst residences.

sen.j: 名前は、堀川に架かっていた木津屋橋に由来するとも、その他のいわれがあるとも言う。
sen.e: It is said that the name, Kizuyabashi-doori street was given after Kizuya-bashi bridge which was built over Hori River and it is also said that the street was named by some other reason.
It is said that the name, Kizuyabashi-doori street was given after Kizuya-bashi bridge was built over Hori River and but it is also said that the street was named by due to other reasons.
It is said that the name, Kizuyabashi-dori Street was given after Kizuya-bashi Bridge was built over Hori-kawa River and but it is also said that the street was named by due to other reasons.
sen.cmt: Kizuyabashi-dori Street, Kizuya-bashi Bridge, Hori-kawa Riverに修正

tit.cmt: Kizuyabashi-dori Streetとし、頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 近鉄百貨店京都店（プラッツ近鉄）
sen.e: Kyoto Branch Store of Kintetsu Department Store (Blats Kintetsu)
Kyoto Branch Store of Kintetsu Department Store (Blats Kintetsu)
Kyoto Branch Store of Kintetsu Department Store (Blats Kintetsu)
Kyoto Tower
Kyoto Tower
Kyoto Tower
Shichijo Police Station
Shichijo Police Station
Shichijo Police Station
Shimokyo Fire Station
Shimokyo Fire Station
Shimogyo Fire Station
Shimokyo Ward Office
Shimokyo Ward Office
Shimogyo Ward Office
Umekoji Park
Umekoji Park
Umekoji Park

sen.j: 松尾神社御旅所 御前通角
sen.e: Matsuo-jinja shrine otabisho (a place for portable shrines to rest) at a corner on Gozen-doori street
Matsuo-jinja shrine otabisho (a place for portable shrines to rest) at a corner on Gozen-doori street
Matsuo-jinja Shrine otabisho (a place for portable shrines to rest) at a corner on Onmae-dori Street
